author: Richard Bach
message: Ask yourself the secret of your success. Listen to your answer, and practice it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Sinvyest Tan
message: Don't frown because you never know who is falling in love with your smile.
title: Thought of the day

author: Joyce Brothers
message: Trust your hunches. They're usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: Nothing is at last sacred but the integrity of your own mind.
title: Thought of the day
